query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS whatsapp_notification_logs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  message_type ENUM('daily_summary', 'critical_alert', 'weekly_report', 'test_message', 'compliance_reminder') NOT NULL,
  message_content TEXT NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('pending', 'sent', 'failed', 'delivered') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  twilio_message_sid VARCHAR(100),
  error_message TEXT,
  sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  delivered_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX user_id_idx (user_id),
  INDEX status_idx (status),
  INDEX message_type_idx (message_type),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)

  delivered_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX user_id_idx (user_id),
  INDEX status_idx (status),
  INDEX message_type_idx (message_type),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)
